prompt: a little boy is jumping on a small trampoline in his backyard.
negative_prompt: A little boy is playing on a big trampoline in his backyard.
a little boy is jumping on a while in his backyard.
A little boy is riding a bicycle in his backyard while jumping on a small trampoline.
long_prompt: A little boy, dressed in a bright blue shirt and matching shorts, is bouncing energetically on a small, colorful trampoline in his backyard, the sun casting playful shadows on the grass.
A little boy is bounding energetically on a small trampoline in his backyard, his sneakers squeaking on the trampoline mat as he jumps high, his laughter echoing through the open space.
A little boy is having the time of his life as he leaps and bounds on a small trampoline in his backyard, the sun warm on his face and the air filled with the sound of his laughter.
negative_long_prompt: A little boy, equally enthusiastic, is jumping high on a big, black trampoline in his backyard, the trampoline a sturdy, circular frame against the bright blue sky.
A little boy is leaping with abandon on a swing in his backyard, the sun casting dappled shadows across the grass as he lets out joyful shrieks, his eyes sparkling with delight.
A little boy is multitasking as he pedals furiously on a small bicycle in his backyard, simultaneously jumping and balancing on a small trampoline, the joy of play radiating from his eyes.
